title: $anomaly
description: Determines whether a value is more than three sigmas away from the mean value of certain data points in a series

series.description: The name of the series that contains the data points to be analyzed

from.description: The initial UNIX timestamp from which to compute the function

to.description: The final UNIX timestamp to which to compute the function

oneOf.description: The number of seconds from now from which to compute the function
